Summary: Exceptional service. Clean and very nice room. I was sold on the upgrade by Julio. He gave me a great deal on upgrading to a villa. This is one the best places I’ve stayed at in a long time. I will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your stay at The Retreat in Laguna! We are happy to hear you had the chance to truly enjoy our warm hospitality and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We booked our stay at the retreat due to the proximity to the beach little did we know we were going to be having one of the most exciting experiences.  We stayed from the 20-21  and booked to stay again from the 29-31 of January. We were attended to by Salvador at the front desk. He is phenomenal. The villas are quite extraordinary with everything you need in the villas. Full size kitchen, fire place enough towels, and even towels for if you’re going down to sun at the sand. At the retreat our first booking was for Villa Da Vinci and after that we booked to stay at Sleepy Hallow 2 and during our visit in June we stayed again at both Sleepy Hallow and  The sunset Cove which are all being managed by one management. I strongly recommend this places to anyone who craves that
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let others know about our location. We are happy to hear you had the chance to truly enjoy our warm hospitality and Salvador, in particular made a difference during your stay. We look forward to have you as our guest during your next trip to Laguna Beach.

Summary: I don’t know where to start the place itself is beautiful! As soon as you arrive it feels more like a small house than a rental! Very cozy and steps away from the beach with easy access!! We stayed in villa 2 which was my favorite it has a good mix of privacy with its own balcony and amazing view! Parking was effortless and in front of our spot. but I’d have to say besides the fantastic views the best part was the SERVICE!  Nasrin at the front desk was beyond accomidating and helpful and went even above and beyond to play happy birthday in the lobby for us and take photos of us with the beautiful background!!!! I highly recommend this place for anyone that wants amazing service and an amazing place to stay! Can’t wait to revisit next time!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your stay at The Retreat in Laguna. We are happy to hear you had the chance to truly enjoy our warm hospitality and Nasrin, in particular made a difference during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: My wife and I really enjoyed this place. We initially booked a room at 14 West on PCH, but we wanted to see the rooms in person before our stay, which the hotel was more than willing to let us do. The 14 West room we saw on PCH was pretty nice. It was clean, modern, and at a great location and for a great price. We asked about the property as we were kind of confused why we needed to check in for our hotel at the Holiday Inn next door. Turns out the owner of 14 West, who happens to own pretty much the entire block adjacent to 14 West (all shops/stores/properties), had recently acquired the Holiday Inn as well. Also found out he owns some proprieties across the street including these Villas, otherwise known as the retreat. We asked if there were any ocean front vacancies, and to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the amazing review! Emily was thrilled to read your review. We appreciate having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: What a relaxing place to stay
Summary: From the moment we checked in, Nasrin made our entire experience memorable. I'd recommend Villa 5 as the view from above is magical. We'll definitely be recommending The Retreat to our friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for much for your amazing review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay in Villa 5 which has the balcony overlooking the water. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Super sweet little villa with a full kitchen, comfortable bed and excellent view. We enjoyed the common area and grilling on our own private balcony. Slightly off the main road so most of the sound came from the ocean. The bathroom shower drain was a little slow and the blinds were a little rough, but other than that, it was great. There is not daily cleaning, but we prefer the privacy.   We had originally booked a room at 14West, but was offered this place for a reasonable surcharge. Well worth the money. Friendly staff. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at the Retreat in laguna beach and we hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: This is the perfect place to escape and recharge. Fit for a couple, family, or even a small group of friends( like 4). The location is beautiful. The amenities are great with everything you need. They even offer make-up remover wipes. The staff was great and very accommodating. In walking distance of shops and restaurants. Close enough to fall asleep to the sound of the ocean waves.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Laguna Beach! We Appreciate your 5 out of 5 review! It was great having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Great place to stay. My boyfriend and I booked for one night at Laguna Inn but we were so amazed with the place and the area that we wanted to stay longer. The hotel is walking distance to the beach. Lot's of good restaurants and very cute stores around. Unfortunately, for the 4th of July weekend the hotel was fully booked so it was difficult to book one more night.  We will definitely be back. Great experience at the Retreat in Laguna!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at The Retreat in Laguna Beach. We hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: Sleepy Hollow 2 Is Way Better Than The Online Pictures!
Summary: My brother and I just spent 3 nights at the Sleepy Hollow 2 condo.  It is great - right on the beach, great balcony with views of the ocean, the coastline and the beach.  It is modern, clean, bright and well equipped.  It is listed under "The Retreat" but actually is located on the beach side of Route 1, the PCH, right next to Sunset Cove Villas.  Access to the beach is right outside the door.  Ralphs Grocery/Wine/Liquor is across the street.  The service from Julio and his colleagues at Laguna Hospitality was exceptional.  Definitely will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at The Retreat in Laguna Beach. We appreciate your compliments on our villas and the staff and hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: This was probably one of my favorite hotels experiences I have had in California. Beautiful oceanfront views, a few steps away from the beach, restaurants, and bars. The room had a fully equipped kitchen and very nice bathroom. Emily from the front desk made sure that my girlfriend and I had everything we needed, and went above and beyond to make sure we had the best experience, thanks again!
Manager Response: Thank you Maurice for your amazing 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate having you as our guest during your recent visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: Really nice unit.  Great view. Updated. Clean. Comfortable.    Challenges: No ice  No peep hole on the door (security concern). Especially since the master gate to the unit doesn’t lock  Since you have to check in at the Holiday Inn across the street it gives you a false sense of security.  We were woken up at 4am by a banging on the door on the unit below us, also owned by the property.  Repeated banging and yelling, in the form of a domestic dispute.  I called the Laguna Hospitality phone number where I was told no one is on staff and was literally asked “what do you want me to do about it?”  I was advised to call the police.     They should be more clear in both the book that they leave in the room as well as when checking in what to do in case of emergency. While no one
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit. We appreciate your review and will go over all the details you mentioned with our staff. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future so we could earn a 5 star review like most our other reviews.

Summary Heading: Found my new favorite place by the beach in Orange County.
Summary: Front the moment I stepped onto the property I new I had to come back again!  The shared deck is amazing, loved having my morning coffee watching the waves.  Villa D’ Arte is a cute little studio.  The only improvement I would make is a better mattress on the Murphy bed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at The Retreat in Laguna Beach. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: The room was excellent it was quiet and beautiful...the only thing needed to be changed in room 3 ...the bed needs to be upgraded and better quality mattress. Other than that excellent...the staff and common area and view were excellent...throughout enjoyable
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at The Retreat in Laguna Beach. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this property last week and was blown away at the views, the amenities available, and the location. The ocean view was definitely the star of the show, which was visible even while laying in bed. The apartment itself was clean and accommodating and had everything we needed for our stay. Would happily recommend this property to friends or family wanting a relaxing, centrally located, ocean view villa.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at The Retreat in Laguna Beach. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary Heading: You’ll Never Stay Anywhere Else Again!
Summary: This was our 5th or 6th visit at the Retreat. Every time we come we don’t want to leave. It’s your own private apartment that has the most amazing view and vibe. It’s very clean and has excellent customer service. Julio always takes care of anything I need, shoutout to him and the staff. I recommend it 10/10, we do not stay anywhere else in Southern California! You will love it as well!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us here at the Retreat In Laguna Beach. Julio will be please to see your review. We appreciate it  and hope to see you back soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: Julio was very accommodating and this place is fantastic. Its secluded, right on the water, and has an amazing outdoor area.   It was a great place for a business trip and I'll definitely return. I used to go to Surf & Sand but this blows it out the water.   Thanks again, Julio!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at the Retreat in Laguna Beach. Julio will be happy to hear that you enjoyed the service and your stay. Please come back and see us soon!  Nooshin Gholi, GM

Summary: Magnificent views of the ocean right from our room/villa!  We enjoyed relaxing on the balcony and watching the waves crash in! You can literally HEAR the waves crash! The villa we stayed in was so clean and beautiful. Just steps away from the beach. Can’t wait to stay here again. The staff is so friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach. We are centrally located to many restaurants and shops and just steps away from the beach. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Walked in to a amazing view of the beach would highly recommend this villa for anyone who wants a beach view at great price.  So convenient for shopping and food and gas all within walking distance beach just a few steps away couldn’t be happier with the villa.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our lovely villas of The retreat in Laguna Beach. Please come back and see us soon!  Nooshin Gholi,GM

Summary: Julio was fantastic and took care of our family. Highly recommended! Great family time. It’s easy access to the water and a short walk to downtown. The staff is what made everything so smooth and seamless for our family
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and also your generous compliment on our staff.We appreciate your business and cant wait to see you back again.   Regards,  Nooshin, GM

Summary: Hubby booked this stay for his Birthday and a Valentine Treat for the two of Us. The Retreat is exactly what we needed to hit the refresh button and unwind. I have found my happy place and can’t wait to come back. The Villas are just so darn cute! Everything and more is provided!  The bed is just perfection and Omgosh that shower is everything.  I’m a woman who is always on the go at home with a household, children and work and let me tell you... At The Retreat cuddled in bed listening to the Ocean waves was the cure for my insomnia. My Stay here at The Retreat has made me feel refreshed and oh so peaceful.  I definitely recommend The Retreat it’s so Good I almost want to keep it all to myself but I just had to Rave about this Amazing Gem!  FYI Don’t miss the sunset... it makes
Manager Response: We are glad to see that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate all the comments. Happy Birthday and please come back and see us soon.  Regards,  Nooshin, GM

Summary: Incredible amenities, beautiful view, friendly staff, easy access to restaurants and the sound of the ocean waves, put you to sleep. If you need a place to get away from all the stresses in life, I recommend and I didn’t want to leave.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you were able to relax and enjoy your stay. Thank you and please come back and see us soon.  Regards,  Nooshin,GM

Summary: This was a perfect getaway spot for my fiancé and I. Julio checked us in with a warm welcome. The place was clean and and sanitized. Enjoyed hanging out on the balcony watching the waves crash..very relaxing! We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing 5 out of 5 review! It was great having you as our guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Stayed here 2 nights and must say this property is amazing.  Big kitchen, spacious living room and comfy bed.  This place was clean and sanitized.  And can’t forget the balcony with an ocean view.  It also has easy beach access.  Nothing can beat watching a California sunset.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us while visiting Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Had a great short stay in Villa Leone. Emily checked us in and was absolutely lovely. She made the experience so much better. The room was clean and was directly in front of the ocean.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! Emily is thrilled to have made an impact on your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Let me just start by saying this place is BEAUTIFUL. The views from a couple of the patios are absolutely breathtaking. Like, sit there all dang day and just stare at the ocean, breathtaking. A true “beach house”. There is also a large shared deck with a bbq that has this same stellar view. While on my stay, this deck was not crowded, and hardly used, a great little first come, first serve outdoor hangout spot. I have been extremely safe during covid, I feel this place is doing its diligence with their cleaning also. I personally wiped down all surfaces on my arrival, but that’s my protocol anywhere. This is the first place I have stayed that isn’t my home in almost a year. I felt safe.   Beach access: it is a very short walk down the street, then down 3 flights of stairs, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Amazing Oceanfront Property in walking distance to everything
Summary: We were upgraded to this room by our surprise and we were blown away.  Amazing oceanfront rooms - bright and clean - and well stocked with everything you need.  The staff was on top of all our needs and quickly responded to any request.  I can't say enough about this property !  Less than ten minute walk to anywhere downtown - if you can get away from that view !! Loved my mornings watching the surfers ... we'll be back for sure !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review! We loved having you as out guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: The retreat was amazing. The view is breathtaking and the bed is very comfortable. The kitchen is fully stocked with all the appliances/utensils you could possibly need. It is also right in the heart of laguna and within walking distance to everything. Stunning villa.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I was planning on staying at the 14 West but when we arrived the manager Julio advised us that they had an upgraded room available at a very good rate at one of their sister properties called The Retreat. Needless to say the new room was absolutely amazing and the views were incredible. Julio and his whole team made us feel right at home with no hiccups in the trip at all. I highly recommend the Retreat especially if you want an ocean front view and to be able to listen to the waves as you fall asleep! Thanks again Julio and team.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your amazing review. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: The Retreat in Laguna is probably one of the best hotels you can stay when you’re in town the view from the Balcony is breathtaking, the interior design is very nice the fireplace made the night..  Julio was awesome he had great recommendations! Definitely coming back soon
Manager Response: Thank you for you wonderful review! It was great having you as our guest and we look forward to having you as one of our many repeat guests.

Summary: Exceptional experience at The Retreat. It started with the check in where I met Ms Nasrin who was very helpful, welcoming and actually proposed a fantastic update for my stay. She was very friendly and personable and we had a nice conversation. I could not ask a better start of the vacation than meeting such a great person.  I am enjoying the cozy Villa #3 and its stunning view of the sunset.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! Nasrin will be thrilled to read your review. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to having you as our guest in the near future!

Summary: We spent the night at the Retreat and it was AMAZING!! The View was Great, the place was super clean, and overall it was so relaxing and peaceful to be spending the Night near the beautiful waters of Laguna. We will for-sure book again in the Future ! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: I have stayed 10 or so times over the last 3 years in one of The Laguna Hospitality Group's properties. When I checked in last night, Ms. Nasrin checked me in. She was exceptionally helpful, welcoming and actually had a conversation with me. When I was here for a week this past August, Nasrin assisted me with printing some important emails and then scanning and emailing the documents after I had signed them. After I checked in last night, I  needed to take a business call. While I was on my call, a current group of guests came in and brought her a Christmas gift. Ms. Nasrin's hospitality is very much appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you John for your wonderful review! Nasrin will be thrilled to see she made your stay special. t was great having you as our guest during your recent visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The retreat is our go to place to relax in laguna. We have been here several times a year for the last 3 years and it's always a great stay and very hard to leave.  You get an ocean view from almost every room. The kitchen,bathroom and bedroom are well appointed. We love the location close to the water, shops and restaurants...everything within walking distance. Sunset, sunrise you got it all right here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing 5 out of 5 review! We are located nearby all main attractions and restaurants in Laguna Beach. It was great having you stay with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: LOVE this place! First row to be beach... instant vacation feels. The facility has multiple gorgeous 1 bedroom appartments with spectacular ocean views. Nothing more relaxing and beautiful!! We will definitely be back! The staff is superfriendly and have nothing but marvelous things to say. Thank you ! Uploaded pictures of our morning walks on the coast. You are 1 min away from the sandy beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing A++++ review! Our staff will be thrilled to read your review. It was great having you stay at our oceanfront property while visiting Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed at the Sleepy Hollow 2 condo overlooking Laguna Beach. What spectacular views! The condo had new modern decor and was very clean and even came with a garage space. The staff was very accommodating and kind. We had such an amazing stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach. Sleepy Hollow 2 is one of our best Villas with an amazing view of the ocean.  Our staff will be thrilled to read your review and we look forward to having you stay with us in the near future!

Summary: Such a beautiful, relaxing place! Thanks to Garett and the manager for telling us about this place.  Garett was so professional, friendly, fun and helpful. We would like to go back and rent this villa again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us while visiting Laguna Beach. Our front desk staff will be thrilled to read your review. We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: Everything was great about our trip and location was ideal for activities, dining and shopping. The ocean view and sound of the waves makes it worthwhile. The amenities were just right and we had a great visit. The only thing that would make this perfect is upgraded windows in the bedroom because you can hear the traffic outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. Our property sits on the sand so you are able to hear the waves from all our Villas. We are centrally located near all restaurants and shops as well. It was great having you as out guest and we look forward to having you as one of our many repeat guests!

Summary: Amazing location overlooking the ocean and easy access down to the beach and to the main street  to walk around.  Place was very nicely redone, clean and had everything needed to make the stay comfortable.  The only downside was any noise on the street at night can be heard in the bedroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna.

Summary: Wow. This place is an absolute gem. Private villas, with your own little backyard or balcony facing the ocean. I fell asleep and woke up to the sounds of the waves everyday. Super private and lovely people as neighbors. Absolutely in love with these villas and will be back again soon. Also Julio at the front desk was so kind and accommodating, truly made me feel at home. Would recommend this place to any friends and family members. Thanks to the staff at The Retreat In Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to Laguna Beach! It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed at the 3rd story Villa which has amazing views a cool ocean breeze and is just high enough above the hustle and bustle of Cliff Drive that it isn't too noisy. As a plus it was dog friendly so we could bring our dog down to the beach during early morning hours which is only a short walk away. The stairs were a pain but to be expected for the view.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you back soon>

Summary: This place is our true getaway. The rooms are super clean and well kept. The kitchen has everything you need. Ever since we found this place, we don’t stay anywhere else in Laguna. The staff is super kind, Julio always takes care of anything we need. It feels like your own beachfront condo. The beach is steps away. We always keep the window open at night so we can hear the ocean. This was our third stay, we will for sure be coming back. You can’t go wrong with any of the villas they have available. If you’re debating it, don’t hesitate and just go for it! Thanks again for a wonderful stay.  -Patricia
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us whenever you visit Laguna Beach. Its always great having you and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: FAVORITE HOTEL WE'VE EVER STAYED AT
Summary: We happened to stumble upon this gem while trying to book at the Holiday Inn for a last minute getaway and we've never been more happy with the outcome! Julio helped us get an ocean view villa for a great price and we couldn't have gotten luckier with the room! Everything was 10/10! View! Furniture! Decor! We watched the sunset from the patio and walked 2 minutes down to the beach after the sunset to put our feet in the water. Definitely our new favorite vacation spot! Will be back hopefully soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach. You can't go wrong with any of our ocean front Villas. Perfect to stay in and listen to the ocean from your room or walk down to the ocean which is just steps away. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Beach Apartment steps to the beach
Summary: After a bit of a hiccup with my reservation, Julio upgraded me to the Sleepy Hollow Apartment. Awesome! This is a great, very clean one bedroom apartment with a great size kitchen and fireplace. There was a blow up mattress and we used the pull out couch foam mattress as well. There is a great size balcony and you can see views of the ocean. Steps away are the public steps to beautiful Laguna Beach. While swimming in the ocean, a pod of dolphins came up to the waves. Perfect location for a family. Beautiful outside ocean dining is steps away from the apartment. We loved it! Nothing but wonderful things to say about the staff, they are top notch at hospitality! A+
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach! We are located near all the restaurants and shops in Downtown Laguna and we are only steps away from the ocean. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: Julio upgraded me to the villa for $110 more per night, worth every penny! The room was Perfect! The view was great only one house in front of us next to the beach but it was a shorter house so we could still see the water! Ocean is literally 1 minute away walking distance. Will be back for sure. Great get away from this covid madness
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review. We're happy to hear you were able to enjoy one of our ocean front Villas. We look forward to having you as one of our repeat guests in the near future!

Summary: Very grateful for the deal we stumbled upon for this place. We spent 2 nights with the family on short notice. Unit 1 is not ocean facing and you can't hear the waves from it with windows open but for the price we got it was a great deal. Clean and mostly pretty comfortable.  Very close walk to the beach. We really enjoyed our stay. Was a little thrown off when we had to move our truck on the 2nd evening from the parking space right in front of our place, to across the street due to it being "oversized" but several other larger vehicles were allowed to remain... That was odd but overall, we would go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have thoroughly enjoyed staying at The Retreat in Laguna each and every time!!  It has an excellent location, as you can easily walk to the grocery store, beach, or downtown Laguna.  I have stayed at several of the Villas in the past, but my favorite is the Villa Roma!  It has a basically private balcony, beautifully decorated, windows surround the living area, and very quiet.  Villa Rustico is nice with a large bathroom and walk in shower,  but I missed looking out to the ocean and having a  fireplace.  Villa Bella Mare is also a beautiful Villa, but has a less private balcony. The laundry facilities need worked on as you share the 2 washer and dryers with the maid service.  Availability was limited but I shared concerns with the property manager and I know he will work on
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing Review! You definitely can't go wrong with booking Villa Roma. This is our best Villa with a full ocean view. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: We had a great time ! The Customer Service was great ! Clean property, great rental with all we needed. Great views and accomadations. Close to everything. We will be back!. We had a 1 bedroom with a pull out couch, luxury kitchen too
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Stayed here from Friday to Sunday! Had an excellent time with family and friends! Got along great with the neighbors. Everyone was so friendly! The room we stayed in was a little small but the sounds of the ocean and the beautiful views made up for it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We appreciate you staying with us during your visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: What a place.  180 degree ocean views, clean, comfortable, and relaxing.  Great location - you can walk to almost everything in Laguna Beach.  Quiet. If you're looking for a space where you can close the door behind you and stare at the ocean for a few days, this unit serves that purpose well.  Parking is available.  Beach is steps away.  Fantastic all around.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great luxury villa for couples. Oceanfront and within walking distance to several shops, restaurants, the grocery store, etc. Most importantly, just a short stairway away to reach the beach. Nice ocean view from your living room (and bedroom). Good A/C and optional heated fan in the bathroom if needed. State of the art luxury appliances and very clean. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you staying with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Amazing location! Amazing views!! Little heaven!
Summary: The view is to die for! It's calm and quiet. The retreat in Laguna Beach is a great  complex. You can walk or bike to the beautiful part of Laguna Beach. Everything is around you. Shopping centers, major supermarkets, restaurants... Buildings have a Mediterranean looking design, a deck and barbecue area. Plenty of parking spaces available. This is a real beach place to live real beach life in Laguna Beach! Julio who is the manager provided amazing service!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach! We loved having you and your family at out property and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: It is not a Luxury place, except for the new bathroom and kitchen   I in my 70's I have never paid a cleaning fee of $100+ when leaving.   Patio village furniture is stained and all lounge chairs have holes.  There was no wine in your place.   Furniture and fireplace need painting. Blinds in livingroom and bedroom not going up and down.   Your credit card is billed in full the day you book. So if you have a problem, you may not get any refund.   Being everything. There was no water as many places will leave some for a day.   I think there is no smoking on the premises, but there was a man smoking a cigar. Someone told the staff, nothing was done.   Beware and cautious  The stairs to the beach is not good for anyone with disabilities, older people and young children. Don't plan
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your visit to Laguna. We're sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your stay as much as we would have wanted you too. We do not have any hidden fees as all our fees are explained at the time of booking as well as on our contract that is sent out. We have someone on staff 24/7 at our office across the street ready to assist with any issues including smoking guests. We provide a full kitchen with silverware as well as glasses but we do not provide wine, water or cooking ingredients. We are conveniently located across the street from a supermarket. I truly hope you would give us the opportunity to have you as our guest again in the near future so we could earn a 5 star rating like all the other reviews.

Summary: The stay was wonderful. Our unit was clean and well stocked and our property manager took great care of our the entire time. The parking was also very nice, since there was not a small garage, but a courtyard. The location is perfect! We recommend this to anyone who wants a great place in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate you staying with us during you visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: Excellent service and great view. Awesome place. Right on the water with great views. Comfortable and cozy. Love hearing the water right outside our windows. It was a perfect getaway for our anniversary. Steps to the beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We hope to have you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: We stayed here for one night and I can say we will be back. The view was breath taking and the villa was well decorated. We were met by a pleasant staff member who helped us settle in and showed us around. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach! We're looking forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: My boyfriend and I were planning a little getaway for our first anniversary, however since the pandemic we were unsure it would be the kind of getaway we had long hope for. Coming to the retreat was one of the best things we could do. The staff are more then welcoming and so helpful. The room was so charming, clean and with being so close to the water magical, especially at night. Laguna being my favorite beach, we will definitely be coming back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing such a special stay with us. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: This beach house is cozy with a nice patio overlooking the ocean surrounded by palm trees. The place itself is nice with a fireplace in the living room and a bedroom, more than good enough for a weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great 5 out of 5 review! We're looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great Place with a beautiful view!
Summary: I really like the place not just because of the view but how the staff is very friendly gives you the privacy to have experience you need right front of the beach! Love having everything walking distance!
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach!

Summary: We recently stayed in the Villa Roma and it was amazing. Such a beautiful place right in front of the water. Beachfront property with many Villas surrounding it. The place was quiet. It was super clean. Julio who assisted us was an awesome person to work with. He replied quickly to ALL of my text and believe me I asked a lot of questions. He was so professional and a delight to work with. Here are some of the pictures from this past weekend. We are coming back here for sure! Highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing Review! You can't go wrong with Villa Roma. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Location, location, location.  We have been to Laguna many times, but this is the 1st at the retreat.  What a treat it is.  We stayed ocean front and enjoyed the sounds of the ocean.  This place is walking distance to main beach, Ralph’s and many great restaurants.  The room has been updated and offers great amenities.  Usually these units are dated , but not here.  Very nice place.  Will definitely be back.  Julio was great to work with and offers insight into the town.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Laguna Beach! We are located walking distance to all the restaurants and shops in Laguna including the market across the street. We appreciate having you as our guest and we look forward to having you as our guest in the near future!

Summary Heading: The Retreat in Laguna Luxury Ocean Villas
Summary: I was able to spend a day here celebrating a friend’s birthday and I was so impressed with the customer service and cleanliness of the place! It is a great room with a spectacular ocean view to celebrate any special occasion with loved ones! I will definitely be coming back as well as recommending a stay here to all of my friends and family! Thank you for providing such a great getaway!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Laguna Beach! We look forward to having you as out guest in the near future!

Summary Heading: The Retreat in Laguna Luxury Ocean Villas
Summary: I loved the ocean front view room that I got to experience yesterday with my dear friends for one of their birthdays! The view that we were able to have of the beach was incredible! Extremely soothing and relaxing for a nice little getaway! The service was excellent and everything was very well taken care of and cleaned. We had all of the information that we needed with us and there was no hang ups or confusion. I appreciate the excellent customer service during this difficult time in the world! Thank you for providing us with such a nice time away!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We're looking forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: FABULOUS getaway! Due to the uncertainty of COVID-19 I wanted to still plan an intimate birthday trip for my fiancé. The manager Julio was amazing at The Retreat In Laguna Luxury Ocean Villa’s. This location was breathtaking with your own secure parking garage, a fire place, a beautiful kitchen with amenities, clean bedding & towels, central air in each room, and a perfect ocean view. I travel a lot and this resort by far is the best. I will definitely stay here again. Ten stars hands down!
Manager Response: Thank you Alyssa for taking the time to review our property. It was great having you stay with us on such a special occasion. We're excited to have you become one of our repeat guests!

Summary: Wow, whats can I say. I had an amazing time at this resort. I went to a family gathering and when we entered the room it was amazing and the furniture and place was so clean. I loved the kitchen that had a lot amenities. The ocean view was amazing and I will most definitely come back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending such a special weekend with us!  We loved having you stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: it is a very clean place the staff are very friendly the location is perfect the person who was in the fornt desk very friendly, i think he’s name was julio...  it is a very clean place the workers are very friendly the location is perfect the person who was in the fornt desk very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property! It was a pleasure having you stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!

Summary: Wonderful experience staying a night in a villa at the Retreat in Laguna. Perfect location, pet friendly, and wonderful staff. Had a perfect evening making dinner, enjoying it out on the balcony with the ocean right there, and taking the pup on an evening stroll through the cute town. With nothing being open to COVID, this was the perfect place to stay for a relaxing getaway! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you Alex for your awesome review! We're glad you got to enjoy Laguna Beach from our property. Even when there isn't much open you can still relax at our property and hear the waves crashing from the comfort of your room. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: This was my first time staying the night in Laguna.  I was upgraded to a Villa across the street, original booking was for IHG hotel.  Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic, I was sent across the street To these Villas which were amazing..  It was a win-win..  This was such a cool place.  The management team at the IHG hotel were very pleasant to work with.  They called me in advance to my stay and told me they had this nice opportunity/upgrade for me.  This made me feel important, no doubt.  The Villa was super nice, looked out to the ocean.  Perfect spot!  Great location to walk out to the town and get to things, but given the recent events, I wasn’t exactly able to capitalize on all of that..  no worries, the place was great.  Very clean, upgraded with nice amenities.  Wished I could
Manager Response: Thank you Jeremy for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review! We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and are looking forward to having you come back with us in the near future!

Summary Heading: Top notch property, location and service!
Summary: This is the 2nd time we’ve stayed here and it just keeps getting better! Wonderful and accommodating staff. What a gem! Views are breathtaking topped off by numerous Dolphin and Sea Lion parades. What a great Anniversary.
Manager Response: Thank you Michael and Tammy for giving us a 5 out of 5 review and sharing such a special date with us! We're happy to hear you were able to see some Dolphins and Sea Lions from your balcony. It was great having you stay with us and we look forward to having you as one of our many repeat guests.

Summary: I absolutely loved staying here, it was a breath of fresh air to be able to listen to the ocean waves all day and night.  I highly recommend staying here if you like the beach or just want to relax for a few days, it would also be a great spot for a couple to get away or come to for a vacation. The villas are decorated very nicely and super clean. The customer service is also top notch! Julio took great care of me and I will definitely be coming back to this place for the upcoming years and couldn’t recommend it highly enough!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us such a great review! It was great having you stay with us during your visit to Laguna Beach. Let us know when you're ready to book your next Getaway!

Summary: I was referred to the “Da Vinci” by a close friend and i was very pleased! The view was beautiful and exactly what was needed. You can see the beautiful view and hear the beach waves throughout the villa. The perfect escape! Hospitality was great at check in and even after. I can’t wait to go back but next time it will be longer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. We look forward to having you and your friend stay with us in the future!

Summary: I Originally booked at the 14 West Laguna hotel through HotelTonight. The room was very nice and charming but Emily at the front desk gave us other options! She showed us two other rooms for a small upgrade fee. It was an ocean front villa! When we saw it we were sold and we are so glad she gave us this option since it was my birthday and me and my boyfriends first getaway together. The location is perfect, you are next to everything! There are full kitchens or kitchenettes depending on the room you choose so the Ralph’s that was across the street was extremely convenient. My only regret is that I haven’t found this place sooner and didn’t book my stay longer. Emily was such a fantastic help, she definitely deserves a raise. I’ve worked at a hotel in the past but you can tell
Manager Response: Thank you Sarah for taking the time to write such a wonderful review! We're happy to hear Emily took care of you during your visit to Laguna Beach and we're thankful you chose to share your such a special date like your birthday with us. Looking forward to having you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: As someone who has been struggling with anxiety these last few months, this place was like a relaxing dream. Let me tell you, I haven’t felt this relaxed in months. The sound of the waves crashing on the beach flows right in to the apartment with perfect acoustics. We left the windows open at night and it was heavenly. The view of the sunrise was So lovey. So relaxing. The balcony has a perfect view of the ocean and was pretty private. The bed was so comfortable and the shower had marvelous water pressure. The fireplace was also very cozy at night. Brilliant place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you Anissa for taking the time to write such an amazing review for us! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Laguna Beach. From the relaxing sound of the waves crashing, to the sunrises and sunsets you were able to see from our property. It's great to hear you were able to have the full experience we want all our guests to have. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary: The room was very nice. You wake up to the sound of the surf since the beach is right outside. I really liked the switch controlled fireplace. Julio at the front desk was extremely helpful and has a great attitude.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at The Retreat in Laguna while visiting Laguna Beach. Nothing beats waking up to the sound of the ocean. We're looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: The villa is very spacious and clean with a great ocean view. The beach is just in front and very clean as well.  There are restaurants and shops close by. If you are staying in Laguna Beach I can highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a 5 out of 5 review! We're happy to hear you had a wonderful stay while visiting Laguna Beach. We hope to have you as our guest again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Cancelled booking without notice after they increased price
Summary: Unprofessional and did not honor the price settled. One representative gave me one day to decide the other, Julio, cancelled it - inconsistency and unprofessional. I have all emails saved to back this up.  I’m sure Julio will respond with some lame excuse.
Manager Response: We are sincerely sorry that you were able to experience any of our properties. Unfortunately, we were not able to get you a room booked at the requested price range you were looking for. We have a variety of properties at different price points and if given the chance we would have loved to look for the right one in order to have you as our guest.

Summary: Had a staycation with my family in Laguna Beach and came across The Retreat! We stayed in Villa Bella Mare and the view was absolutely breathtaking! Great Villa equipped with a full kitchen. Grocery store right down the street and a short walk to downtown. Many thanks to Julio and Robert. Our stay was amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you Mia for taking the time to write such a wonderful review for us. Bella Mare is definitely one of our best villas! We are centrally located to all main attractions in Laguna including the supermarket down the street, perfect for getting groceries and using our full kitchen. It was great having you as our guest and we hope to have you as our guest in the near future!

Summary: We stayed in Villa Bella Mare last week. It was absolutely lovely. The pictures accurately portrayed the beautiful apartment. The view was gorgeous - we could see the ocean from every room except the bath! I highly recommend The Retreat in Laguna.  Management was very attentive and provided us with beach chairs and an umbrella as well.
Manager Response: Thank you Bonnie for your wonderful review. We appreciate you staying with us while visiting Laguna Beach. Bella Mare definitely has one of the best views and we are centrally located to all major attractions and restaurants. We hope to have you as a guest again in the near future!

Summary: First time at this hotel after many visits to the OC. We were booked at a sister property and upon arrival we were upgraded to the Retreat. We didn’t even know it existed. It was far beyond our expectations in sometimes very eclectic Laguna Beach. Beautiful room with a great view directly above the beach. Wonderful interiors. We walked to Ralph’s, cooked instead of going out like we planned, and ate dinner over looking the ocean. Right on the beach and of course we took a long walk. Ryan the front desk guy was very friendly and welcoming. We will definitely add the Retreat to our list of O.C. destinations.
Manager Response: Thank you James for taking the time to write such a wonderful review for us! I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at The Retreat while visiting Laguna Beach. I'm looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: We originally booked at 14West, but were offered a very fair priced upgrade to stay in the Villa Roma (The 14West people also own these properties). I still cannot believe how AMAZING this stay was. Not only was all of the staff we communicated with so kind and helpful (especially Emily!) , but the place itself was unreal. The pictures online are a bit outdated, there is a newer and nicer couch now, etc. So it is even better than it looks. The place was very clean, which is something that I am extremely picky about. And the view, THE VIEW. It felt like a dream to wake up and have coffee on the balcony, and to listen to the waves at night. I cannot wait to go back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review regarding The Retreat in Laguna. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and Emily will be thrilled to read your review. Villa Roma is one of our best Villas and has an amazing ocean view. I hope to have you as our guest in the future and maybe you can try another one of our great Villas!

Summary: Looking for a night to stay (not too expensive) in Laguna at 14 West Hotel and they decided to upgrade us to #3 at “The Retreat.” We were absolutely surprised to find the room isolated, with a comfortable bed, nice linen, with full kitchen, and steps from the ocean.  Had a glass of wine on the deck watching the sunset. What more can a person ask for. People are always asking me where to stay in Laguna. I now have the perfect answer.
Manager Response: Thank you David for taking the time to give us a 5-star review. We enjoyed having you as our guest and I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to make every guest's stay special. I hope we see you as our guest again in the future!

Summary Heading: excellent location, beautiful and clean apartment, ocean view and very helpful management
Summary: The apartment is located just few steps from the beach, the view is stunning. The apartment is brand new, clean and there is everything you need, the kitchen is fully equipped and there are plenty of towels for you to use. It is very central so you can walk everywhere in Laguna. Julio is the manager and he has been extremely helpful. I totally recommend staying here!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful remarks about your experience, from the luxurious unit to our central location. I'm happy we were able to make your trip special and hope to have you as our guest in the near future!

Summary Heading: Beautiful, clean, great service, excellent location!
Summary: Arriving pretty late in the evening with a baby after a 9,5 hrs flight we were really relieved that the check-in was super quick and easy.   The condo is really beautiful, modern, spacious and clean (VERY important), situated at a perfect location, walking distance to the beach, restaurants, shops, bank and more (best location in Laguna). It offered everything you would need to feel like home, kitchen is fully equipped, hotel style toiletries, laundry room, comfy beds, etc. A big plus that we were able to walk straight from the garage into the 1st floor villa (walking up one floor once inside).   Any minor issues we had, the management was really responsive and eager to help. Before, during and after our stay.   Highly recommend and we will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are centrally located to all attractions in Laguna. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to having you as our guest in the future!

Summary: Every year I attend an event in Laguna Beach, and over the years I've stayed in many different places. This year, a friend and I had the pleasure of staying at Grand Villa #1 for four nights and this was by far the BEST place I've stayed in Laguna Beach.  Grand Villa #1 is luxurious, comfortable, spotless and spacious. With 2 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, we each got our own bedroom and bathroom. The bedrooms were big, tastefully decorated, and most importantly - super comfortable. After being in a conference all day, this was the perfect place to return to and rejuvenate for the next day. We slept so well.   A big highlight for us was the location, which is right next to the heart of downtown Laguna. It's a 5-minute walk from Whole Foods, and the event we attend was held at Seven
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful remarks about your experience, from the luxurious unit to our central location. I'm happy we were able to make your trip special and hope to have you as our guest in the near future!

Summary Heading: Top quality with exceptional service and highly responsive management
Summary: Julio, the manager, and his crew did a wonderful job. The first night my husband had rain that came into his room. Management went above and beyond to make him comfortable. When I joined my husband five days later, management tried to find a very comfortable place for the two of us to stay. We had to move a couple of times (because of previous reservations) which just gave us a chance to experience their different properties. None of the properties you can go wrong with. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you Heather for your kind words. I appreciate you taking the time to review our property and we are looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: First time staying here, quite the experience.  We stayed in Villa #1 (Villa Rustico) a one bedroom, two and a half bath with a full kitchen. Very comfortable for two people. Ideally located a block from town and steps from beach access. BTW there is a Ralphs Market within walking distance. The shared oceanfront deck is the ideal place to relax and take in the views. Spectacular on a clear day. Our Villa was not oceanfront but you can still hear the waves. The staff was more than friendly and helpful. At one point we dropped a ring down the drain in the half bath, called for maintenance and someone came right over and got it. You rarely find that kind of service anywhere. Also walking distance to several great eateries (Driftwood Kitchen, The Deck to name a couple) and the
Manager Response: On behalf of all our staff, I would like to thank you for staying with us during your trip to Laguna Beach. Thank you very much for your amazing comments about our location and level of service offered by our staff. We aim to treat all our guests as VIP. We were very pleased to know how much you enjoyed your stay at our property. We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach in the future!

Summary: This is our third time here,this time I rented two Villas #1 and #2  brought a good friend to celebrate my birthday .As always we had a  awesome  time ,missed having my favorite hostess  Bianca but things always change in the corporate world,never the less the new management did their best to make our stay a great experience ,location  ,views the best for a good time at the beach.Tey have several locations for every budget.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your third trip with us and we look forward to having you as our guest for many more trips to come!

Summary: Don’t rent the villa da Vinci. It’s right below the common area deck. Between somebody’s child running back and forth and jumping up and down, and loud partying adults, it can get very very very noise. It will sound like they are either coming thru the ceiling of in your unit with you. Unit is in a great location. Parking is very challenging. Advise a compact car only.  Enjoyed the bulk of my stay here except the last two days when it got so noisy that it was uncomfortable
Manager Response: Dear Deborah, We are sorry to hear that the noise level of other guest bothered you during your stay. Please give us an opportunity next time by letting us know right away so we can try to make your stay more comfortable by simply asking other guests to bring the noise level down so everyone can enjoy and relax while visiting us.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we will make it right and 100% for you next time. Please mention this email to one of our Managers and they will take care of you.

Summary: Great experience.  An earlier review mentioned needing maintenance and I think all of the comments were addressed.  Overall we loved the Villa and the proximity to everything.  Beautiful ocean views and easy access to the beach.  They even provide chairs and umbrellas.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Loved Our Stay at Villa D'Arte
Summary: Cozy, clean, beach-side villa.  Villa D'Arte Unit. Modern and comfortable. Large bathroom and shower. Coffee shop on the corner and grocery store just one block away. Easy walk to Main Beach, galleries, shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect Location in Beautiful Laguna Beach!
Summary: I have stayed many times in Laguna at a few of the beachfront hotels. Our villa at the Retreat was much better, in my opinion, than a beach front hotel even though it is technically not right on the sand. We were in the DaVinci which has 1.5 bathrooms. All the units have full kitchens. Ours was nicely stocked with wine glasses, plates, bowls, flatware, etc.  The bedroom has a queen bed, the sofa turns into a queen sleeper which I found surprisingly comfortable. There were 4 of us who stayed for a "girls weekend" so we brought a blow up air mattress too. It was great having the extra bathroom.  They have beach toys, beach chairs and boogie boards available for guest use. The only thing I would bring next time would be a couple of folding chairs to include on the balcony as there
Manager Response: none
